name: part_005
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】#まちゅまちゅ動画 ～インターネット老人会～【ホロライブ⧸夏色まつり】 [CXLL4W4w4I8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Natsuiro Matsuri concludes her performance of 'Miku Miku ni Shite Ageru'.
A transition screen displaying various video clips.

subtitles.original: 大好きを伝えたい
subtitles.english: I want to tell you how much I love you

subtitles.original: だからもっと
subtitles.english: so please let me

subtitles.original: 私に歌わせてね
subtitles.english: sing even more.

subtitles.original: みくみくにしてあげる♪
subtitles.english: I'll make you Miku-Miku'd♪

subtitles.original: みくみくにしてあげる♪
subtitles.english: I'll make you Miku-Miku'd♪

subtitles.original: みくみくにしてあげる♪
subtitles.english: I'll make you Miku-Miku'd♪

subtitles.original: みくみくにしてあげる♪
subtitles.english: I'll make you Miku-Miku'd♪

subtitles.original: ハロー　窓を開けて　小さく呟いた
subtitles.english: Hello, I opened the window and muttered softly.

subtitles.original: ハワユ　誰もいない　部屋で一人
subtitles.english: How are you? All alone in an empty room.

subtitles.original: モーニング　朝が来たよ　土砂降りの朝が
subtitles.english: Morning, the day has come, a morning of pouring rain.

subtitles.original: ティクタ　私のネジを　誰か巻いて
subtitles.english: Tick-tock, someone please wind my spring.

subtitles.original: ハロー　昔のアニメにそんなのいたっけな
subtitles.english: Hello, was there someone like that in an old anime?

subtitles.original: ハワユ　羨ましいな　皆に愛されて
subtitles.english: How are you? I'm so jealous, being loved by everyone.

subtitles.original: スリーピン　馬鹿なこと言ってないで　支度をしなくちゃ
subtitles.english: Sleeping, stop talking nonsense and get ready.

subtitles.original: クライン　涙の跡を隠す為
subtitles.english: Crying, to hide the traces of my tears.

subtitles.original: もう口癖になった「まぁいっか」　昨日の言葉がふと頭を過る
subtitles.english: I've started to say "Whatever" out of habit, then yesterday's words suddenly cross my mind.

subtitles.original: 「もう君には全然期待してないから」
subtitles.english: "I don't expect anything from you anymore."

subtitles.original: そりゃまぁ私だって　自分に期待などしてないけれど
subtitles.english: Well, I don't exactly expect anything from myself either, but...

subtitles.original: アレは一体どういうつもりですか
subtitles.english: What on earth was that supposed to mean?

subtitles.original: 喉元まで出かかった言葉　口をついて出たのは嘘
subtitles.english: The words that almost came out of my throat, but what left my mouth was a lie.

subtitles.original: こうして今日も私は貴重な　言葉を浪費して生きてゆく
subtitles.english: And so, again today, I go on living, wasting my precious words.

subtitles.original: なぜ隠してしまうのですか　笑われるのが怖いのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you hide it? Are you afraid of being laughed at?

subtitles.original: 誰にも会いたくないのですか　それ本当ですか
subtitles.english: Do you not want to see anyone? Is that really true?

subtitles.original: 曖昧という名の海に溺れて　息も出来ないほど苦しいの
subtitles.english: Drowning in a sea called ambiguity, it hurts so much I can't even breathe.

subtitles.original: 少し声が聞きたくなりました　本当に弱いな
subtitles.english: I've started to want to hear a voice just a little. I'm really weak.

subtitles.original: 一向に進まない支度の途中　朦朧とした頭で思う
subtitles.english: In the middle of getting ready, making no progress, I think with a hazy head.

subtitles.original: 「もう理由を付けて休んでしまおうかな」
subtitles.english: "Maybe I'll just make up an excuse and take the day off."

subtitles.original: いやいや分かってますって　何となく言ってみただけだよ
subtitles.english: No, no, I know. I just said it for the sake of it.

subtitles.original: 分かってるから怒らないでよ
subtitles.english: I know, so don't get mad.

subtitles.original: 幸せだろうと不幸せだろうと　平等に残酷に朝日は昇る
subtitles.english: Whether happy or unhappy, the sun rises with an equal cruelty.

subtitles.original: 生きていくだけで精一杯の私に　これ以上何を望むというの
subtitles.english: I'm doing my best just to survive, what more do you want from me?

subtitles.original: なぜ気にしてしまうのですか　本当は愛されたいのですよ
subtitles.english: Why do you worry? You really just want to be loved.

subtitles.original: その手を離したのは誰ですか　気が付いてますか
subtitles.english: Who was it that let go of that hand? Do you realize it?

subtitles.original: 人生にタイムカードがあるなら　終わりの時間はいつなんだろう
subtitles.english: If life had a time card, I wonder when the clock-out time would be.

subtitles.original: 私が生きた分の給料は　誰が払うんですか
subtitles.english: Who is going to pay the wages for the time I've lived?

subtitles.original: ここかわちい
subtitles.english: This part is cute

subtitles.original: サンキュー
subtitles.english: Thank you

subtitles.original: サンキュー　ありがとうって言いたいの
subtitles.english: Thank you, I want to say thank you.

subtitles.original: サンキュー　ありがとうって言いたいよ
subtitles.english: Thank you, I want to say thank you.

subtitles.original: サンキュー　一度だけでも良いから
subtitles.english: Thank you, just once would be fine.

subtitles.original: 心の底から大泣きしながら　ありがとうって言いたいの
subtitles.english: While crying my eyes out from the bottom of my heart, I want to say thank you.

subtitles.original: なぜ隠してしまうのですか　本当は聞いて欲しいのですか
subtitles.english: Why do you hide it? Do you really want someone to listen?

subtitles.original: 絶対に笑ったりしないから　話してみませんか
subtitles.english: I definitely won't laugh at you, so why not try talking?

subtitles.original: 口を開かなければ分からない　思ってるだけでは伝わらない
subtitles.english: If you don't open your mouth, nobody will know. Just thinking it won't get it across.

subtitles.original: なんて面倒くさい生き物でしょう　人間は
subtitles.english: What a troublesome creature humans are.
